name: Quetzal
storyline: After a big earthquake, disruption reigns in the world and the fabric of reality has become unstable. Answers lie beneath the surface, but the path is plagued with danger. Embark on a mystic and profound journey as Quetzo, one of the last remnants of the Midbirds. Quetzo’s journey will be a rich, yet painful experience that will not only help restore the balance of nature, but make him come to terms with his heritage and his place in the world.
summary: Embark on a mystic journey in Quetzal, a fast-paced, bullet hell platformer highly focused on reactive gameplay. You’ll discover a mystical underground world, defeat blood ravenous stone creatures, and survive tortuous obstacles in your quest for answers and meaning.
